title: How to Use Online Pho.To! Editor

steps.headline: Go to Pho.To!
steps.description: Editor. Save some time and have a photo ready, or look around for Creative Commons pics that you can alter!

steps.headline: Upload one or more photos that you want to edit.
steps.description: Once you do, all of your options will no longer be grayed out. Depending on the speed of your computer, it may take a bit.

steps.headline: Start looking at the different options.
steps.description:
Change Perspective
Rotate
Crop
Resize

Correct Photos
Quick Enhancement
Deblur
Color Temperature
Enhance Color
Adjust Saturation
Denoise

Enhance portraits
Red Eye
Auto Makeup
Glamour Effect
Caricature

Apply Artistic Effects
Black and White
Sepia
Color Tint
Neon
Sunny Colors
Fire or Flames
Pencil Drawing
Chalk and Charcoal
Oil Painting
Mosaic

steps.headline: Broaden your horizons.
steps.description: You aren't limited to just portraits. You can alter all types of pictures!

steps.headline: Check your work as you progress.
steps.description: This photo has been cropped, had a color enhancement and color temperature adjustments.

text:
Go to Pho.To! Editor. Save some time and have a photo ready, or look around for Creative Commons pics that you can alter! Upload one or more photos that you want to edit. Once you do, all of your options will no longer be grayed out. Depending on the speed of your computer, it may take a bit. Start looking at the different options. Change Perspective
Rotate
Crop
Resize

Correct Photos
Quick Enhancement
Deblur
Color Temperature
Enhance Color
Adjust Saturation
Denoise

Enhance portraits
Red Eye
Auto Makeup
Glamour Effect
Caricature

Apply Artistic Effects
Black and White
Sepia

Neon
Sunny Colors
Fire or Flames

Chalk and Charcoal
Oil Painting
Mosaic Broaden your horizons. You aren't limited to just portraits. You can alter all types of pictures! Check your work as you progress. This photo has been cropped, had a color enhancement and color temperature adjustments.
